sentences.en: Good for sensitive, agnail skin and take it into calm, propitiatory situation.
sentences.cn: 适合敏感、红肿 、 发炎的皮肤.有镇定, 消除红肿,安抚的效果.

sentences.en: He sent her flowers as a propitiatory gesture.
sentences.cn: 他将花送给她以求好感.

sentences.en: She saw the flowers as a propitiatory offering.
sentences.cn: 在她看来，送花是主动和解的表示。

trans.tran_cn: <正>劝解的，抚慰的，谋求好感的，哄人息怒的
trans.tran_en: intended to please someone and make them feel less angry and more friendly
